title: Knightstar
description: This is a previously-published edition of ASIN: B06WD6JZP7. For all editions see here Over 130 years ago, the evil superhuman, Nero, was finally defeated. His powers were placed into a glass orb and hidden inside a time capsule.Today, fifteen year old, Oliver lives in the crime-ridden city of Keldon, where he just wants to go under the radar and get through school. All of that changes when he opens the time capsule at his school and inherits Nero’s superpowers. It grants him super strength, super speed, and telekinesis, to name a few powers, but it brings out Oliver’s dark side.Oliver learns to control his superpowers, dons a mask, and launches a crime wave across the city as Knightstar. Oliver soon finds another superhuman partner in crime in Forsaken. They both have been assigned a deadly mission by the ghost of Nero, and together they try to bring the city to its knees and prepare for a new order, ready for Nero’s resurrection. However, when Knightstar is subjected to the pain and suffering he has caused, will he be the most dangerous super villain of all time or become the superhero Keldon needs?
author: James       Martin
